title: Define Project Requirements and User Stories
description: Document the system requirements for the NeurofeedbackStressReducer device and create user stories for each functionality.

title: Design User Interface Wireframes
description: Create wireframes for the user interface of the NeurofeedbackStressReducer device.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and User Stories

title: Design Portable Device Hardware Layout
description: Create a design for the portable hardware of the NeurofeedbackStressReducer device.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and User Stories

title: Develop Real-time Neurofeedback Algorithms
description: Create the algorithms responsible for providing real-time neurofeedback to the user.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and User Stories

title: Integrate Hardware Sensors and Software Algorithms
description: Combine the hardware sensors with the software algorithms to create a functional neurofeedback system.

title: Implement User Interface Design on Mobile Platform
description: Build the mobile application interface using the wireframes as a guide.

title: Perform Software Unit Testing
description: Test individual components of the NeurofeedbackStressReducer software for functionality and error handling.
dependencies: Integrate Hardware Sensors and Software Algorithms

title: Perform System Integration Testing
description: Combine all system components to ensure proper integration and functionality.
dependencies: Integrate Hardware Sensors and Software Algorithms

title: Prepare User Manual and Documentation
description: Create a user manual and other necessary documentation for the NeurofeedbackStressReducer device.
dependencies: Integrate Hardware Sensors and Software Algorithms
